comment.author: 64428854@N04
comment._content: BF Mahoney had already purchased Ryan Aircraft and Ryan himself had little to do with the building of the Spirit of St Louis. BF had kept the name of the company as Ryan Aircraft leading to some confusion. This is well documented in Lindbergh's books about his historic flight. I was BF who traveled by steamer to meet Lindbergh and they traveled back to the US together after the historic flight. see link: www.charleslindbergh.com/plane/mahoney.asp
